info.title: Website Screenshots
info.description: Generate screenshots of websites in JPEG or PNG. This can either be the desktop version, mobile version or the full page version of a website.

get.description: Creates a thumbnail for the given url.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: How long to wait after the page has loaded to create a screenshot. Time in millisecond. Default is 2500.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The output format. Currently PNG and JPEG are supported.

parameters.name: fullpage
parameters.description: If set to true, the entire page will be rendered.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: If set to true a screenshot of the mobile website will be returned.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the website you want to caputre. E.g. http://thumbnail.ws/ or https://www.google.com/.
